title: Bug 101187 - Localization key is required when adding
description: When adding a localization key, it is currently mandatory to provide a value. However, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: The properties file should allow a blank key with a valid value so that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a blank localization key in the properties file, but provide a valid value.
2. Observe that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
